tool_input.command: nohup hugo server -D --bind 0.0.0.0 --port 1313 >/tmp/hugo-preview.log 2>&1 & sleep 1 && pgrep -af "hugo server -D --bind 0.0.0.0 --port 1313"
tool_input.description: Starts Hugo preview server in background

tool_input.pattern: 热映|即将上映|高分推荐
热映|即将上映|高分推荐

tool_input.description: Builds Hugo site including drafts for verification

tool_input.command: export CI=true DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT=0 GCM_INTERACTIVE=never HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE=1 GIT_EDITOR=: EDITOR=: VISUAL='' GIT_SEQUENCE_EDITOR=: GIT_MERGE_AUTOEDIT=no GIT_PAGER=cat PAGER=cat npm_config_yes=true PIP_NO_INPUT=1 YARN_ENABLE_IMMUTABLE_INSTALLS=false; git log --oneline -8
tool_input.description: Shows recent commit messages for style

tool_input.command: export CI=true DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT=0 GCM_INTERACTIVE=never HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE=1 GIT_EDITOR=: EDITOR=: VISUAL='' GIT_SEQUENCE_EDITOR=: GIT_MERGE_AUTOEDIT=no GIT_PAGER=cat PAGER=cat npm_config_yes=true PIP_NO_INPUT=1 YARN_ENABLE_IMMUTABLE_INSTALLS=false; git status --short --branch
tool_input.description: Shows branch and working tree status

tool_input.command: export CI=true DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT=0 GCM_INTERACTIVE=never HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE=1 GIT_EDITOR=: EDITOR=: VISUAL='' GIT_SEQUENCE_EDITOR=: GIT_MERGE_AUTOEDIT=no GIT_PAGER=cat PAGER=cat npm_config_yes=true PIP_NO_INPUT=1 YARN_ENABLE_IMMUTABLE_INSTALLS=false; git diff
tool_input.description: Shows unstaged and staged code changes

tool_input.command: export CI=true DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT=0 GCM_INTERACTIVE=never HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE=1 GIT_EDITOR=: EDITOR=: VISUAL='' GIT_SEQUENCE_EDITOR=: GIT_MERGE_AUTOEDIT=no GIT_PAGER=cat PAGER=cat npm_config_yes=true PIP_NO_INPUT=1 YARN_ENABLE_IMMUTABLE_INSTALLS=false; git status --short -- layouts/list.html .gitmodules
tool_input.description: Checks status of target and staged gitmodules

tool_input.command: export CI=true DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT=0 GCM_INTERACTIVE=never HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE=1 GIT_EDITOR=: EDITOR=: VISUAL='' GIT_SEQUENCE_EDITOR=: GIT_MERGE_AUTOEDIT=no GIT_PAGER=cat PAGER=cat npm_config_yes=true PIP_NO_INPUT=1 YARN_ENABLE_IMMUTABLE_INSTALLS=false; git add -- layouts/list.html && git commit -m "Update tag term pages to use homepage list layout" -- layouts/list.html && git status --short --branch
tool_input.description: Commits only the list layout override file

tool_input.command: export CI=true DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT=0 GCM_INTERACTIVE=never HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE=1 GIT_EDITOR=: EDITOR=: VISUAL='' GIT_SEQUENCE_EDITOR=: GIT_MERGE_AUTOEDIT=no GIT_PAGER=cat PAGER=cat npm_config_yes=true PIP_NO_INPUT=1 YARN_ENABLE_IMMUTABLE_INSTALLS=false; git push origin main
tool_input.description: Pushes latest commit on main to origin

tool_input.command: export CI=true DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT=0 GCM_INTERACTIVE=never HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE=1 GIT_EDITOR=: EDITOR=: VISUAL='' GIT_SEQUENCE_EDITOR=: GIT_MERGE_AUTOEDIT=no GIT_PAGER=cat PAGER=cat npm_config_yes=true PIP_NO_INPUT=1 YARN_ENABLE_IMMUTABLE_INSTALLS=false; git push -u origin HEAD:fix/tag-pages-home-style
tool_input.description: Pushes current commit to new remote branch

tool_input.command: export CI=true DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT=0 GCM_INTERACTIVE=never HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE=1 GIT_EDITOR=: EDITOR=: VISUAL='' GIT_SEQUENCE_EDITOR=: GIT_MERGE_AUTOEDIT=no GIT_PAGER=cat PAGER=cat npm_config_yes=true PIP_NO_INPUT=1 YARN_ENABLE_IMMUTABLE_INSTALLS=false; git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/main main && git status --short --branch
tool_input.description: Restores main tracking branch and shows status

tool_input.command: export CI=true DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT=0 GCM_INTERACTIVE=never HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE=1 GIT_EDITOR=: EDITOR=: VISUAL='' GIT_SEQUENCE_EDITOR=: GIT_MERGE_AUTOEDIT=no GIT_PAGER=cat PAGER=cat npm_config_yes=true PIP_NO_INPUT=1 YARN_ENABLE_IMMUTABLE_INSTALLS=false; git ls-remote --heads origin main
tool_input.description: Checks remote main branch latest commit hash

tool_input.command: export CI=true DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive GIT_TERMINAL_PROMPT=0 GCM_INTERACTIVE=never HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE=1 GIT_EDITOR=: EDITOR=: VISUAL='' GIT_SEQUENCE_EDITOR=: GIT_MERGE_AUTOEDIT=no GIT_PAGER=cat PAGER=cat npm_config_yes=true PIP_NO_INPUT=1 YARN_ENABLE_IMMUTABLE_INSTALLS=false; git status --short | wc -l
tool_input.description: Counts number of local changed files
